job.title: New Grad, Software Engineer
job.description: strongWho are webrbrstrongNetflix is the worlds leading streaming entertainment service with over 209 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series documentaries and feature films across a wide variety of genres and languages Members can watch as much as they want anytime anywhere on any internetconnected screen Members can play pause and resume watching all without commercials or commitmentsbrbrIf you have a passion for solving challenging problems building scalable robust systems love working with the latest technologies in a fastpaced agile environment and are excited at the prospect of having a significant impact on software that over 209 million people use and love then we want to talk to youbrbrWho are youbrulliNew Grad with a BSBA in a technical field such as Computer Science Engineering Math Statistics Grad Date between Dec 2021 amp August 2022lili1 relevant internship experience or school project experience liliGreat problemsolving skillsliliCurious and motivated learnerliliClear communicator  you are concise and articulate in speech and writingliliCoursework or relative experience with data structures algorithms and debugging Bonus if youve taken a course on distributed systemsliliPractical knowledge of Java or any other objectoriented programming languagebrliulWhat will you learnbrulliBuild largescale applications that solve complex business problems elegantlyliliDistributed system design and architecture processliliWriting high quality performant and industrystandard codeliliWorking closely with business stakeholders in a fastpaced environmentbrliulWhat we use todaybrulliJava Gradle Spring Boot 2x gRPC Atlas Spinnaker Elasticsearch SQL AWS etcliliNote that you dont need to know all of these right now but you should be excited to learn thembrliulNetflix is an equal opportunity employer that celebrates diversity recognizing that diversity of thought and background builds stronger teams We approach diversity and inclusion seriously and thoughtfully We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status
